content: दूषक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (षिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [दुष्-णिच्-ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Corrupting, polluting, vitiating, defiling, spoiling. {@--2@} Violating, dishonouring, seducing. {@--3@} Offending, trespassing, guilty. {@--4@} Disfiguring. {@--5@} Sinful, wicked (as an action). --कः {@--1@} A seducer, a corrupter. {@--2@} Any infamous or wicked person.
दूषक, दूषण, दूष्य &c. See under दुष्.
